Cases.SQL: select * from t1;
select * from t1 where a<1;
select * from t1 where a>1
select * from t1 where a=1
select * from t1 where a in (1,2,3)
Plan: Batch_Point_Get root table:t1, handle:?, keep order:false, desc:false

Cases.SQL: select * from t1 where b=1
Plan: ├─IndexScan cop  table:t1, index:b(b), range:[?,?], keep order:false

Cases.SQL: select a+1,b+2 from t1 use index(b) where b=3
Plan: └─IndexScan cop  table:t1, index:b(b), range:[?,?], keep order:false

Cases.SQL: select * from t1 where t1.b > 1 and  t1.a in (select sum(t2.b) from t2 where t2.a=t1.a and t2.b is not null)
Plan: └─TableScan cop  table:t2, range: decided by eq(test.t2.a, test.t1.a), keep order:false

Cases.SQL: SELECT * from t1 where a!=1 order by c limit 1
SELECT /*+ TIDB_SMJ(t1, t2) */ * from t1, t2 where t1.a = t2.a and t1.c>1;
Plan: MergeJoin       root inner join, left key:test.t1.a, right key:test.t2.a

Cases.SQL: SELECT /*+ TIDB_INLJ(t1, t2) */ * from t1, t2 where t1.a = t2.a and t1.c>1;
Plan: IndexJoin_10       root inner join, inner:TableReader_9, outer key:test.t1.a, inner key:test.t2.a
└─TableScan_8    cop  table:t2, range: decided by [test.t1.a], keep order:false
IndexJoin       root inner join, inner:TableReader, outer key:test.t1.a, inner key:test.t2.a
└─TableScan   cop  table:t2, range: decided by [test.t1.a], keep order:false

Cases.SQL: SELECT /*+ TIDB_HJ(t1, t2) */ * from t1, t2 where t1.a = t2.a and t1.c>1;
Plan: HashJoin        root inner join, equal:eq(test.t1.a, test.t2.a)

Cases.SQL: SELECT /*+ TIDB_HJ(t1, t2) */ * from t1, t2 where t1.a = t2.a and t1.c>1;
Plan: HashJoin        root inner join, equal:eq(test.t1.a, test.t2.a)

Cases.SQL: SELECT /*+ TIDB_INLJ(t1, t2) */ * from t1, t2 where t1.a = t2.a and t1.c>1;
Plan: IndexJoin_10       root inner join, inner:TableReader_9, outer key:test.t1.a, inner key:test.t2.a
└─TableScan_8    cop  table:t2, range: decided by [test.t1.a], keep order:false
IndexJoin       root inner join, inner:TableReader, outer key:test.t1.a, inner key:test.t2.a
└─TableScan   cop  table:t2, range: decided by [test.t1.a], keep order:false

Cases.SQL: select count(1) as num,a from t1 where a=1 group by a union select count(1) as num,a from t1 where a=3 group by a;
Plan: HashAgg         root group by:?, ?, funcs:firstrow(?)->?, funcs:firstrow(?)->?

Cases.SQL: insert into t1 values (1,1,1)
insert into t1 select * from t2 where t2.a>0 and t2.b!=0
update t1 set a=a+1
update t1 set a=a+1 where a>0
delete from t1
delete from t1 where a>0 and b=1 and c!=2
Plan: ├─IndexScan   cop  table:t1, index:b(b), range:[?,?], keep order:false

Cases.SQL: create table t1_tmp (a int)
alter table t1_tmp add column c int
